Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "数据包中不存在指定部件" (#858) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Description**
数据包中不存在指定部件

 File.Stream -> MemoryStream
调用  WordprocessingDocument.Open(memoryStream, true)

**Information**

- .NET Target: (NET Frameworknet461)
- DocumentFormat.OpenXml Version: (2.11.3)

**Repro**

```csharp
// Please add a self-contained, minimum viable repro of the issue.
// If you require external resources, please provide a gist or GitHub repro
// An Xunit style test is preferred, but a console application would work too.
``` 

**Observed**

在 System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetPart(Uri partUri)
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPart.Load(OpenXmlPackage openXmlPackage, OpenXmlPart parent, Uri uriTarget, String id, Dictionary`2 loadedParts)
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPartContainer.LoadReferencedPartsAndRelationships(OpenXmlPackage openXmlPackage, OpenXmlPart sourcePart, RelationshipCollection relationshipCollection, Dictionary`2 loadedParts)
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPart.Load(OpenXmlPackage openXmlPackage, OpenXmlPart parent, Uri uriTarget, String id, Dictionary`2 loadedParts)
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPartContainer.LoadReferencedPartsAndRelationships(OpenXmlPackage openXmlPackage, OpenXmlPart sourcePart, RelationshipCollection relationshipCollection, Dictionary`2 loadedParts)
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPackage.Load()
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPackage.OpenCore(Stream stream, Boolean readWriteMode)
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.WordprocessingDocument.Open(Stream stream, Boolean isEditable, OpenSettings openSettings)
   在 DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.WordprocessingDocument.Open(Stream stream, Boolean isEditable)


**Expected**

Please add your expected behavior here.
